who.title: Who is Yurii Primush
who.text: My name is Yurii Primush. I’m a human being, a man, an explorer, an adventurer, an entrepreneur, an investor, a coach, and a mentor. I enjoy diving deep into new experiences.
who.text1: I believe that we can open our potential to the fullest and become happier by aсaccepting our imperfection which often becomes our greatest value.
who.text2: I also believe that relationships within our teams and with our clients and in general relationships between people are our most valuable assets. Working in the finance technology sector for almost 10 years I have a great experience in commercial, technical, and operational skills in business. I enjoy working with talented and creative people who like to create technical business solutions. I worked as a partner in several successful fin-tech projects.
who.text3: Since 2017 my focus has been more on personal development: I have 5 years of experience in psychotherapy as a client. Since 2017 I have studied life and business coaching and learning from the best while putting this into practice with business teams and as a private coach.
who.text4: My goal is to make the world a great place through innovation, and technology while building awareness and supporting our environment.  If we have the same goals let’s connect and find further opportunities to make changes together.
who.text5: You are also welcome to visit my social media pages if you want to know more about me.

why.title: Why Yurii Primush
why.text1: People often say that I’m a big and ambitious dreamer that always makes his dreams true. I believe they are right. By the age of 27, I had achieved most of my childhood dreams.
why.text2: I started working during my university studies, at the age of 19. When I turned 20, I launched my first start-up which in 10 years grow into one of the most successful ventures in the field, placing it in 4th place in the CEE region. The success helped me to generate significant personal wealth already by the age of 30. I believe that this success was a result of a combination of a good strategic view, creativity, proactivity, scale of thinking, leadership, and managerial skills. I’ve been often told to be a good team player and a very empathic person. At the same time, I believe that I can sometimes be very straightforward in my suggestions and opinions.
why.text3: I hold an International Economics and MBA degrees. I’m also a certified professional life and business coach, participating regularly in various educational programs. I’m proud to be a client in psychotherapy for the last 5 years. I love working on my personal development which always helps to discover new perspectives pushing me to challenge myself. Working in psychotherapy also helps me not to bring my personal agenda to the sessions with my clients in coaching, so there is full focus on the client and client’s requests.
why.text4: If you have an idea or a challenge and you dream to change something, to have a more meaningful and successful life, you want to achieve new and exciting goals in your business or in your personal life, I promise to do everything possible to help you on this path.

what.title: What is coaching
what.text1: Coaching is not only a set of tools and techniques that help to unleash your potential at your own expense but also the art of creating a coaching environment for the comprehensive development of the client.
what.text2: Coaching is profoundly different from consulting, mentoring, counseling or therapy. The coaching process is about specific personal projects, business successes, general conditions and transitions in personal life, relationships, or the client's profession, studying what is happening now, learning what your obstacles or challenges may be, and choosing a course of action, your life is what you want it to be.
what.text3: Coaching is a developed alliance between the coach and the client, where the coaching relationship constantly gives all the power to you, the client. I believe that you know the answers to every question or challenge you may have in your life, even if those answers seem incomprehensible, hidden, or hidden inside. My skills are knowing the right questions, as well as the right tools and techniques that will allow you to find answers within yourself. You, the client, are the only expert in your life who really knows who you are and what you need. You are the only expert who can recognize what is best for you. And I’m an expert in the coaching process.
what.text4: As your coach, I help you find out what your best decision might be. Every day we make a choice to do or not to do a lot. These choices can range from profound to trivial, and each has an effect that makes our lives fuller or less fulfilling, more balanced, or less balanced, making our lives more efficient or less efficient. Coaching helps you learn how to make choices that create an effective, balanced and fulfilling life.
what.text5: You, the client, are the only expert in your life who truly knows who you are and what you need. You are the only expert who can recognize what is best for you. I'm just an expert in the coaching process.
what.text6: As your coach, I will help you find out what your best solution might be. Every day we make a choice to do or not to do a lot. These choices can range from profound to trivial, and each has an effect that makes our life more fulfilling or less fulfilling, more balanced or less balanced, making our life process more efficient or less efficient. Coaching helps you learn how to make choices that create an effective, balanced and fulfilling life.

activities.title: MY ACTIVITIES
activities.mentorText: Venture Mentoring Service (VMS) of the University of Luxembourg Incubator helps University’s entrepreneurs turn their ideas into a real business. Under the license of MIT, VMS provides tailored support and industry experts to suit every venture’s needs regardless of their level of experience and stage. My role is to mentor selected VMS startups
activities.member: Member of Luxembourg Business Angel Network (LBAN)
activities.memberText: LBAN unlocks the potential of private investors and helps entrepreneurs to thrive, in Luxembourg and beyond
activities.followText: If you have any idea, feedback, or a comment, or you want to support our projects with a donation, funding, or become a volunteer please contacts us:

links.title: interesting links
links.text: Here you can see articles, information, or videos which I assume interesting or important

link1.name: Nine Reasons Leaders Are Hiring Executive Coaches, And What Happens Next

link2.name: What is Human Capital? Everything You Need to Know

link3.name: The Pygmalion Effect and the Power of Positive Expectations

review1.title: CEO of an IT company(34 years)
review1.text: I started working with Yuri when I was totally lost, with a complete lack of energy for the next steps. Thanks to Yuri, I managed to find internal strength and energy, improve my family relationships, achieve my goals, and I am still working on some of them. I can now enjoy my life to the fullest.
review1.text1: At the start, I had 7 goals that I was able to achieve only after realizing what was stopping me. I went through more than 40 sessions in a year and I still have something to work on, but I already have an internal clear dialogue with myself.
review1.name: Denis Antonov

review2.title: Surgeon, oncologist
review2.text: Yurii is always there when I need it. No matter rather it’s emotional support, solving an issue, a friendly conversation, or a plan with clear steps. Sessions with Yurii bring clarity and always put me back on track if I’m getting lost in my everyday routine. I recommend Yurii as a great coach. If you want to transform your life and live it to the fullest book faster a session with Yurii!
review2.name: Natalia

review3.title: CEO
review3.text: I worked with Yuri for more than a year, and I was satisfied. It was my first coaching experience. I set the goal and moved towards it with progressive steps ... During our sessions I acquired clarity and what clear steps are needed. I am glad that I had the experience working with Yurii!
review3.name: Ihor

review4.title: CFO
review4.text: I’m glad to know Yurii. An intelligent, thoughtful coach. He helps to see the hidden perspective and start doing the postponed. I recommend.
review4.name: Alex

review5.title: Lawyer
review5.text: I worked with Yurii when he first started coaching and it was a very useful and pleasant experience. I continue to successfully use a technique he taught me during our sessions. And I highly recommend working with Yurii!
review5.name: Madina

stand.title: STAND WITH UKRAINE
stand.text1: I’m Ukrainian. I have friends and family in Ukraine. Most of my memories are connected with Ukraine. My heart tears apart seeing how Russia’s invasion, violence, and crimes are destroying and killing a big part of me.
stand.text2: Below you can fund the links to trustworthy organizations in need of funds.
stand.text3: Thank you very much for your support!
stand.card1: The initiative of the President of Ukraine

form.text2: Both online and offline coaching sessions are offered. For more information please contact:
